org.codeavengers.main.data.jpa

Interface JPAPersister<K,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persister
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJPAPersister, CategoryPersister, LocationPersister

    public interface JPAPersister<K,V>
extends Persister
    This is a Marker interface used to mark all persister classes. It also defines the basic methods of interaction with the data store.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    abhishek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V add(V v)
      Adds the element to the Data Store.
      V delete(K id)
      Deletes the requested data from the data store using the id.
      V retrieve(K id)
      Retrieves the requested data from the data store in question.
      java.util.List<V> retrieveAll()
      Retrieves all the data from the data store in question.
      V update(V v)
      Updates the element to the Data Store.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.codeavengers.main.data.Persister

        identify

    • Method Detail

      • add

        V add(V v)
        Adds the element to the Data Store.
        Parameters:
        v - element to be added
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DataLayerFailureException

        1.0

      • update

        V update(V v)
        Updates the element to the Data Store.
        Parameters:
        v - element to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the element was successfully updated
        Throws:
        DataLayerFailureException
        Since:
        1.0

      • delete

        V delete(K id)
        Deletes the requested data from the data store using the id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the element to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the element was successfully deleted
        Throws:
        DataLayerFailureException
        Since:
        1.0

      • retrieve

        V retrieve(K id)
        Retrieves the requested data from the data store in question. The id is the unique identifier used to retrieve the data.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the element to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the returned element
        Since:
        1.0

      • retrieveAll

        java.util.List<V> retrieveAll()
        Retrieves all the data from the data store in question. This method might slow down operation when there is too many data.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the element to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the returned element
        Since:
        1.0
